text: Benevolence and the Mandate of Heaven: Transformation of pre-Qin Confucian Classics is a book by a Taiwanese historian Olga Gorodetskaya (Kuo Ching-yun), published in 2010 in Taipei. The book concerns itself with the Confucian philosophical concepts of Benevolence (Ren) and the Mandate of Heaven and their evolution during the period before the establishment of the empire by Qin dynasty.http://www.bsm.org.cn/show_news.php?id=287 親仁與天命 in Academia ==References== Category:Confucianism Category:Political science Category:History of China Category:Palaeography Category:Works about philology
